title: Hello World
html:
Hi, my name is Dmitrijs

This is the first post in this blog, and for some time it will be kind of "About me" page.

Who I am

I am professional frontend developer from Latvia. I have strong background in developing small to large scale web applications, mostly using React. I also have good experience working with Redux, GraphQL, Typescript, not to mention HTML & CSS. At my everyday work I am on the road to fullstack developer with Ruby on Rails backend.

What is this blog about

In this blog, I plan to write about things that I don't usually do at work - trying different frameworks and libraries, maybe start a pet project and document its development. First step in trying new stuff is done - this page is powered by Svelte, Sapper, and also Tailwind and first posts will be about how it was, so stay tuned.
excerpt: Hi, my name is Dmitrijs and this is the first post in this blog.
